about.title: About RozgaarSetu
about.subtitle: Connecting skilled workers with customers for better opportunities
about.missionDesc: RozgaarSetu aims to bridge the gap between skilled workers and customers seeking quality services. We believe everyone deserves fair employment opportunities and access to reliable services.
about.visionDesc: To create a sustainable ecosystem where skilled professionals can thrive while providing customers with trustworthy, quality services that meet their needs.
about.step1Desc: Find skilled professionals in your area based on your specific needs
about.step2Desc: Connect with workers directly and schedule services at your convenience
about.step3Desc: Enjoy professional services with transparent pricing and reviews
about.joinDesc: Whether you're looking for skilled workers or want to offer your services, RozgaarSetu is here to help you succeed.

hybrid.hybridDemoDescription: Experience our intelligent translation system: JSON for UI elements, Azure AI for dynamic content with database caching
